name: Marshall Inu
public_notice:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Marshall Inu is a token on the Ethereum blockchain who’s mission is to pay UFC fighers, and fighters in general, a fair pay for their fights. It will pay fighters during training, and also add to their fight night purse to ensure they get paid fairly for their efforts.

$MRI is based off the world renowned Shiba Inu, but it has actual utility rather than simply being a “meme” token.
